page.title: 12WORKING IN SOUTH REIGATE
page.content: The block being entirely resident- ial or agricultural,most residents seek employment outside it.Inside,some employment is provided by local shops, service industries,hospitals and by self-employment such as plumbing and building.The only major employer in the block is the Crusader Insurance Co Ltd.Some employment is offered in ag- riculture. Major employers exist at Horley (Philips),Redhill and Reigate(Redland, Foxboro-Yoxall Ltd.,and Civil Aviation Authority),Salfords(Monotype),and Kin- gswood(Legal and General Ass.Soc.). Commerce is a major employer in Redh- ill.Further employment may be obtained by commuting to London or Crawley and to Gatwick Airport.Commuting into the block mainly involves teachers in the schools and employees of Crusader Insurance Co. Ltd.
